category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAW0Defect_default_relation
preference.preference_description: Specifies the relation that has to be created when an object is pasted under an object of type CAW0Defect. The relation specified for this preference will be the default relation that will be created between the source and the target CAW0Defect.
